title: The Bumpkinton Tales: Volume One
description: Welcome to Bumpkinton! Come in, have a cup of tea and a scone, and lose yourself in five humorous tales from the village. Follow Father Whitworth O'Grady as he chokes on a penny, Albert Scatterhorn as he becomes the grubbiest Father Christmas ever, and Amelia Goose as she feuds with... well, anybody. Plus a whole host of characters as they attend the village's first Singles Night with a sex-crazed ladies' man. Jump in and find out more for yourself...The Bumpkinton Tales: Volume One is the first paperback release by the author and includes the stories Last Christmas, Bittersweet, The Bachelor, Albert's Christmas and the exclusive bonus short story, The Family Jewels.Sit back and join the residents who offer plenty of feel-good, comedy moments one minute but will fill your heart with sadness the next.
author: Matthew Drzymala
